benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/block - Block an account

covered: Valid Payload Coverage: The suite validates account blocking with minimal (TC01) and full/extended payloads (TC02), plus varied combinations including partial payloads (TC03, TC04) and edge-case payloads (TC15, TC16, TC17, TC18, TC19, TC20).

Error Handling Coverage: Tests cover 404 for non-existent accounts (TC06), 400 for invalid accountId (TC07), 400 for missing required header (TC08), 400 for missing body (TC09), 400 for malformed JSON (TC10), and 401 unauthorized (TC11).
Security Coverage: Tests for SQL injection (TC13) and malicious payload (TC14).

Edge Case Coverage: Includes empty pluginProperty array (TC15), maximum field lengths (TC16), minimum values (TC17), extra query parameters (TC18), slow downstream (TC19), and large payload near size limit (TC20).
Integration/Plugin Coverage: Integration scenarios with plugin interaction (TC21) and plugin service unavailability (TC22).
Regression Coverage: Duplicate BlockingState prevention (TC23) and backward compatibility with old clients (TC24).
Performance Coverage: High concurrency (TC25) and sustained load/resource usage (TC26).
Accessibility Coverage: API documentation and error messages accessibility (TC27).
gaps: 500 Internal Server Error (HTTP 500) scenarios are not explicitly tested (TC12 uses 503 for service/db issues).
Explicit rate-limiting/throttling (429) scenarios are not covered.
Caching behavior tests (ETag / Cache-Control) are missing.
Content-Type mismatches and invalid payload data types beyond malformed JSON are not tested.
Forbidden scenarios (403) for insufficient permissions are not covered beyond the 401 Unauthorized case.
Additional field-level validation beyond length constraints (e.g., date formats on requestedDate) could be expanded.
recommendations: Add an explicit 500 Internal Server Error test to validate DB/service failure handling.
Introduce explicit 429 rate-limiting tests to verify throttling behavior.
Add tests for caching headers and caching behavior (ETag, Cache-Control).
Add content-type validation tests (415) and tests for invalid data types within the payload beyond malformed JSON.
Add 403 Forbidden scenarios to cover insufficient permissions beyond 401.
Expand field-level validation tests (date formats for requestedDate, more numeric/string constraints).
